name: Short-Term Survival
description:
Click to move, run into things to interact with them.

Your goal is to craft the special key needed to unlock the door on your plot. Gather resources and upgrade your tools to get what you need to craft the key.

You can get resources in many different places, and you may have to think outside the box a bit to get the next item you need. If you're lucky enough to find a Rainbow Piece, you can use it in place of any crafting ingredient.

But be careful, if you're not in shelter (currently indicated by the gray at the top and the green boxes occasionally found in levels) when the world resets every ten seconds, you'll lose everything in your inventory.

Your shelter has a storage, a crafting table, and stations to upgrade your tool and your boots.

Originally submitted to Ludum Dare 51.

Please leave feedback in the comments when you get the chance, I'd love to know how best to balance or what to change.
